SELECT count(ROWNUM) FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum ,SURVEY_SEQ ,SURVEY_NAME ,SURVEY_CONTENT ,ANONYMITY_CHECK_CODE ,SURVEY_START_DATE ,SURVEY_CLOSED_DATE ,STATE_CODE FROM (SELECT SURVEY_SEQ ,SURVEY_NAME ,SURVEY_CONTENT ,ANONYMITY_CHECK_CODE ,SURVEY_START_DATE ,SURVEY_CLOSED_DATE ,STATE_CODE FROM SURVEY_LIST
WHERE survey_name like '%' || '' || '%'
WHERE survey_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND STATE_CODE = #{selection}
AND ANONYMITY_CHECK_CODE= #{anonyMityCheckCode}
AND survey_start_date >= to_date(to_char(#{surveyStartDateLeft},'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND survey_start_date <= to_date(to_char(#{surveyStartDateRight},'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd')
ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC ) )

SELECT count(ROWNUM) FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum ,SURVEY_SEQ ,RATER_ID ,APPRAISEE_ID FROM (SELECT DISTINCT SURVEY_SEQ, RATER_ID, APPRAISEE_ID FROM MAPPING ,USER_INFO UR ,USER_INFO UA ,PROJECT P ,PROJECT_HISTORY PH ,ORGANIZATION_CHART O ,GRADE G WHERE RATER_ID = UR.EMPLOYEE_ID AND UR.DEPARTMENT_ID = O.DEPARTMENT_ID AND UR.GRADE_ID = g.GRADE_ID AND RATER_ID = PH.PARTICIPATION_EMPLOYEE_ID AND PH.PROJECT_ID = P.PROJECT_ID AND APPRAISEE_ID = UA.EMPLOYEE_ID AND ((#{selection} = '60001' AND(UR.EMPLOYEE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR UA.EMPLOYEE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') ) OR (#{selection} = '60002' AND O.DEPARTMENT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') OR(#{selection} = '60004' AND((UR.EMPLOYEE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR UA.EMPLOYEE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') OR O.DEPARTMENT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR P.PROJECT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') ) ) AND UR.GRADE_ID LIKE ( CASE WHEN #{selectGD} = '60004' THEN '%' || '' || '%' ELSE '%' || #{selectGD} || '%' END) AND SURVEY_SEQ = #{surveySeq} )ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC )

SELECT count(ROWNUM) FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum ,PROJECT_NAME FROM (SELECT P.PROJECT_NAME FROM SURVEY_LIST S, PROJECT_HISTORY R, PROJECT_HISTORY A, PROJECT P, ORGANIZATION_CHART O, USER_INFO UA, USER_INFO UR, GRADE G WHERE R.PROJECT_ID = A.PROJECT_ID AND R.PARTICIPATION_EMPLOYEE_ID <> A.PARTICIPATION_EMPLOYEE_ID AND UA.GRADE_ID = 2 AND UR.GRADE_ID = G.GRADE_ID AND UA.EMPLOYEE_ID = A.PARTICIPATION_EMPLOYEE_ID AND UR.DEPARTMENT_ID = O.DEPARTMENT_ID AND R.PARTICIPATION_EMPLOYEE_ID = UR.EMPLOYEE_ID AND R.PROJECT_ID = P.PROJECT_ID AND P.PROJECT_CLOSED_DATE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE -(30 * #{month}), 'YYYY-MM-dd') AND R.PARTICIPATION_EMPLOYEE_ID = #{raterId} AND S.SURVEY_SEQ = #{surveySeq} AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM MAPPING M WHERE M.APPRAISEE_ID = UA.EMPLOYEE_ID AND M.RATER_ID = UR.EMPLOYEE_ID AND M.SURVEY_SEQ = #{surveySeq}) AND ((#{selection} = '60001' AND(UR.EMPLOYEE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR UA.EMPLOYEE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') ) OR (#{selection} = '60002' AND O.DEPARTMENT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') OR(#{selection} = '60004' AND((UR.EMPLOYEE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR UA.EMPLOYEE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') OR O.DEPARTMENT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') ) ) AND UR.GRADE_ID LIKE ( CASE WHEN #{selectGD} = '60004' THEN '%' || '' || '%' ELSE '%' || #{selectGD} || '%' END) ) )

SELECT count(ROWNUM) FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum ,EMPLOYEE_ID FROM (SELECT UR.EMPLOYEE_ID FROM GRADE G, USER_INFO UA, USER_INFO UR, SURVEY_LIST S, ORGANIZATION_CHART O WHERE UR.GRADE_ID = G.GRADE_ID AND UA.DEPARTMENT_ID = O.DEPARTMENT_ID AND S.SURVEY_SEQ = #{surveySeq} AND UA.GRADE_ID = 2 AND UA.EMPLOYEE_ID != UR.EMPLOYEE_ID AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM MAPPING M WHERE M.APPRAISEE_ID = UA.EMPLOYEE_ID AND M.RATER_ID = UR.EMPLOYEE_ID AND M.SURVEY_SEQ = #{surveySeq} ) AND((#{selection} = '60001' AND(UR.EMPLOYEE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR UA.EMPLOYEE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')) OR (#{selection} = '60002' AND O.DEPARTMENT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') OR(#{selection} = '60004' AND((UR.EMPLOYEE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR UA.EMPLOYEE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') OR O.DEPARTMENT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') ) ) AND UR.GRADE_ID LIKE ( CASE WHEN #{selectGD} = '60004' THEN '%' || '' || '%' ELSE '%' || #{selectGD} || '%' END) ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC ) )

select count(ROWNUM) from ( SELECT rnum ,department_name ,grade_name ,employee_name ,SURVEY_COMPLETE_YN FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum ,survey_seq ,department_name ,grade_name ,employee_name ,survey_complete_yn FROM ( SELECT distinct m.survey_seq ,oc.department_name ,g.grade_name ,ui.employee_name ,ui.employee_id ,m.survey_complete_yn FROM grade g ,user_info ui ,mapping m ,ORGANIZATION_CHART oc WHERE m.rater_id = ui.employee_id and g.grade_id = ui.grade_id and oc.department_id = ui.department_id
AND ((#{selection} = '50003' AND ui.EMPLOYEE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') OR (#{selection} = '50001' AND oc.DEPARTMENT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') OR (#{selection} = '50002' AND g.GRADE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') OR(#{selection} = '50004' AND m.survey_complete_YN LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') OR(#{selection} = '50005' AND(ui.EMPLOYEE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR oc.DEPARTMENT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR g.GRADE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR m.survey_complete_YN LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') ) ) ) ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC ) where survey_seq = #{surveySeq} )
